attributes.action: Completely oppose the RJAH Orthopaedic Hospital Trust’s proposed closure of in-patient Rheumatology facilities on Ercall Ward.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This facility is a vital lifeline to Ercall’s many patients, and substituting long term in-patient care for an out-patient service will never be adequate for their needs or equivalent to the service they receive right now, on Ercall Ward.
